metadata.name: Platinum Access Pass #1/2
metadata.description:
Limited collection of 33 NFTs which, as well as being unique collectors' items, offer unique access to Alessandro Safina exclusive community and several membership-only benefits.

What comes with this NFT: All 9 digital copies 'Safina ART' NFTs (1 Ultra Rare + 3 Very Rare + 5 Rare); Co-Production of a song with Alessandro Safina or a Private event performance; Unlimited FREE Tickets for the next concerts; 1 x Special invitation for a Meeting 1-to-1 (Lunch/Dinner) with Alessandro Safina; Unlimited Community Meetings; Full Access to Private Web Area; Premium VIP Assistance.

Token holders can also redeem a personalized physical limited-edition 'Platinum Award' autographated by Alessandro Safina.

ATTENTION: If you are purchasing this NFT from a resale, check which services have already been redeemed on [Safina FRIENDS page](https://nft.alessandrosafina.com/safina-friends). Benefits for each NFT can only be redeemed once.

For more details, full terms and conditions: [nft.alessandrosafina.com](https://nft.alessandrosafina.com)
